properties.entry: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNO, B.* FROM ( SELECT TIP_NO , TIP_TITLE , TIP_INFO , TIP_ING , TIP_CONTENT , TIP_COUNT , DECODE(TIP_TYPE, 1, '손질법', '상식') TIP_CATEGORY , TIP_PIC , TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'yyyy-MM-dd') CREATE_DATE , STATUS FROM TIP_VIEW T WHERE TIP_TYPE=1 ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC ) B ) WHERE RNO BETWEEN 1 AND 10

UPDATE INGREDIENT_TIP SET TIP_TITLE =? , TIP_INFO =? , TIP_ING = ? , TIP_CONTENT = ? , TIP_PIC = ? WHERE TIP_NO = ?
UPDATE INGREDIENT_TIP SET STATUS='N' WHERE TIP_NO=?

UPDATE INGREDIENT_TIP SET TIP_COUNT = TIP_COUNT+1 WHERE TIP_NO = ?
